Content.name: Dirt
Content.description: Just some dirt.. might be useful some day.

Content.name: Grass
Content.description: Basic resource, mainly used for houses but you can use it to grow crops too.

Content.name: Bedrock
Content.description: The hardest material ever known by humans. Can you break it?

Content.name: Wood Log
Content.description: Comes from big tall things. Nothing more is known about this weird material
